nodes.bodyText: Do we support building the project as a WAR?
It seems to me that we might not need a flag but just fail the build if the project isn't packaged as a jar?
I also don't think we need the flag.

+1
Just fail hard and make sure the error is clear and visible.

BTW I suppose you added the flag out of fear of breaking existing applications?
Fear not, it already doesn't work if try to build it as a war. The only problem currently is that the error is very obscure.

Right, I thought I would add a flag to re-enable the previous behavior (which costs nothing) that could be removed in the next version if nobody complained. I didn't specifically think about war packaging/extensions. People do use custom packaging and extensions out there. But, sure, I'll obey :)
